title: The Forky Asks a Question Trailer Is Definitely Not Trash
text:
What is cheese? What is time? Why are bees dying at an alarming rate? Where does that highway go to? Two of these pressing questions about life (and many more) will be answered in Disney+’s cute new series Forky Asks a Question, which finds our lovable Toy Story 4 spork, voiced by Tony Hale, bothering his pals with a near-constant arsenal of inquiries. He might end up being even more confused than he was before, and his pipe-cleaner arms also might fall off due to stress, but hey, at least he doesn’t think he’s trash anymore. The ten “short films” will begin streaming on November 12. And if you want a chance to see some of these shorts early, get your tickets to Vulture Festival where Tony Hale and Toy Story 4 animator Claudio de Oliveira will be screening two of them ahead of the premiere. Hooray!

Related
description: In the first trailer for Pixar’s “Forky Asks a Question,” Tony Hale voices the spork and asks many questions about life.
